definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: Evans wrote me a short note from shanghai .
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯從上海給我寫了封短簡。

sentences.english: Proverbs are short sentences drawn from long experience.
sentences.chinese: 諺語言短簡，得自老經驗。

sentences.english: Consequently write this notelet, conveniently enclose with a pair of earrings.
sentences.chinese: 因此寫這短簡，順便附上耳環一對。

sentences.english: He dispatched the note on Easter Eve.
sentences.chinese: 他在復活節前夕把這封短簡發走了。

sentences.english: Proverbs E are short sentences drawn from long experience.
sentences.chinese: 諺語言短簡，得自老經驗。
